imports.title_explanation: If the format is incorrect, the import will not be done.
imports.stringsdict_file_expected:
Expected .stringsdict 
<plist version="1.0">
<dict>
	<!-- MARK: - GroupName --> OR <!-- GroupName -->
	<key>GroupName_key</key>
	<dict>
		...
		<dict>
			...
			<key>other</key>
			<string>other value</string>
			<key>one</key>
			<string>one value</string>
			<key>zero</key>
			<string>zero value</string>
			...
		</dict>
	</dict>
</dict>
</plist>
imports.xml_file_expected:
<resources>
	<!--groupName-->
	<plural name="groupName_pluralKey">
		<item quantity="other">other value</item>
		<item quantity="one">one value</item>
		<item quantity="zero">zero value</item>
	</plural>
	<string name="groupName_singularKey">singular value</string>
</ressources>

import_errors.json_parse_error: Error while reading "{file}" json file. Check the structure of your file.
import_errors.stringsdict_parse_error: Error while reading "{file}" stringsdict file. Check the structure of your file.
import_errors.reading_file_error: An error occurred while reading the file "{file}"
import_errors.quantity_not_found: The plural keys are not defined with correct quantities ("other", "one" ou "zero"). Received : "{quantity}" on key "{key}"
import_errors.quantity_missing: The plural key "{key}" doen't define all quantities ("other", "one" ou "zero")
import_errors.quantity_not_found_json: The plural keys are not defined with correct format. Expected : "zero | one | other", received : "{value}" on key "{key}". The key has not been inserted.
import_errors.no_plural_tag: No plural key has been found
import_errors.no_singular_tag: No singular key has been found
import_errors.no_group_found: No group has been found in the file. All keys has been set in "common" group.
import_errors.no_group_found_for_key: No group has been found for key "{key}". The keys has been set in "common" group.
import_errors.no_values_found: No values found for "{key}" in language "{language}". An empty value has been inserted.

project_delete.description_2: Its deletion cant be undone and all translation keys and values will be deleted.
project_delete.title: Delete "{name}"
